member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.AllowNullAttribute
member.summary: A non-nullable parameter, field, or property may be null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DisallowNullAttribute
member.summary: A nullable parameter, field, or property should never be null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullAttribute
member.summary: A non-nullable parameter, field, property, or return value may be null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullAttribute
member.summary: A nullable parameter, field, property, or return value will never be null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MaybeNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: A non-nullable argument may be null when the method returns the specified boolean value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: A nullable argument won't be null when the method returns the specified boolean value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.NotNullIfNotNullAttribute
member.summary: A return value, property, or argument isn't null if the argument for the specified parameter isn't null.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnAttribute
member.summary: A method or property never returns. In other words, it always throws an exception.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.DoesNotReturnIfAttribute
member.summary: This method or property never returns if the associated boolean parameter has the specified value.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullAttribute
member.summary: The listed member won't be null when the method returns.

member.name: T:System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.MemberNotNullWhenAttribute
member.summary: The listed member won't be null when the method returns the specified boolean value.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.HealthStatus
member.summary: Defines the status of a component of the application as determined by an health probe.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.HealthStatus.Unhealthy
member.summary: Indicates that the component was unhealthy, or an unhandled exception was thrown while executing the health probe.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.HealthStatus.Degraded
member.summary: Indicates that the component was in a degraded state.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.HealthStatus.Healthy
member.summary: Indicates that the component was healthy.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.HealthStatus.Ignored
member.summary: Indicates that the component was not probed.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthMonitoringService
member.summary: Defines the interface of the health monitoring service. This service is capable of monitoring the health of an application by executing probes on its components.
member.remarks: This allow monitoring the health of an application by executing multiple health probes configured with a builder.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthMonitoringService.ProbeAsync(Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbesBuilder,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Executes the probes defined by the specified builder.
member.param: The probes builder.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The aggregated health result.

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.HealthMonitoring.IHealthProbe
member.summary: Defines an health probe, used to check the health of a component of the application.

member.summary: Runs the health probe.
member.param: The context associated with the current execution.
The cancellation token.
member.returns: The that represents the asynchronous operation. The status of the health probe.
